name: That Darn Forest
description:
It’s finally time for Flora and Griffith to prove that they have what it takes to become wizards, all they have to do is enter the Holly Jolly forest. You may be laughing now, but no one who has entered the forest has come back alive. There is an evil force plaguing the forest, not everything is as cute and innocent as it seems.

That Darn Forest is a multiplayer, action, twin stick shooter on the PC by ProDUCKtive Studios. It is presented in a 2D format where players will be able to fight off hordes of enemies in a battle for survival.

NOTES: Download for demonstration purposes only, requires 2 players, Xbox controller support only, expected to be fully released on Itch.io in April 2018
